author: garanda

changelog.release_notes:
- Added support for Pebble 2 (Diorite)
- Fixes related with SDK 4

- Fix for weather using GPS 
- Added again option to use GPS to get weather

- Since yahoo close the YQL query, theres no more weather by using GPS, now only can use weather by city name. 
- Removed option 'Yes' for use GPS in weather section.
- Added compatibility with Pebble Time firmware (SDK 3)

- Added setting for vibe on disconnect enable/disable
- Fixed Aplite memory leak

- Fix for Aplite doesn't apply settings (Pebble original)
- Now the date numbers change the font color
- Fix issue when No GPS setting was selected and location services are disabled

- Added half, quarter and three-quarter settings for timezones like Caracas, Norfolk Island, Labrador, Eucla, etc.
just set the minutes in the settings page.

For calculate the time differences you can use this page: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html
- Bigger font size for secondary clock, temperature and battery percentage.

- Fixed secondary clock issue gmt in Pebble Time
- Fixed city name secondary clock issue
- Added setting for change font color in both sections.

- Now for Pebble time in full color
- Chose your favorite color in the settings of watchface
- Bug fixes
- Added setting to show/hide seconds (increase battery life)

- Added a Bluetooth icon for connection/disconnection
- Added current temperature using GPS or City name and condition icon
- Added new language Turkish
- Bug fixes

- Added a usefully secondary clock, you can add this in the watchface settings.

*Note: This is not a time zone clock, just adds or subtract hours from the actual time
Added some cool stuffs like 24 format time and invert colors

description:
Great animated pebble face that show the date in a big format, as well the time including seconds in 12h/24h format and the possibility to add a secondary clock (Not timezone, just add or subtract to the actual time).  

Show the current Temperature (Fº or Cº) using GPS or just typing the name of the city you want (powered by Yahoo Weather), and condition icons.

Also have a very usefully animated battery indicator on the right-top of the screen, never get discharge your Pebble again. 

Bluetooth icon for connection/disconnection (vibes on disconnect)

Multilingual clock by settings in the Pebble app of the Phone and more cool stuffs. 

More info: http://youtu.be/rMviK6940d4

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added support for Pebble 2 (Diorite)
- Fixes related with SDK 4

title: The Big Date Dual clock
